alert.note: Alert for Burnet; Llano (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 05 at 8:18PM CDT until May 05 at 9:00PM CDT by NWS Austin-San Antonio
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 900 PM CDT FOR CENTRAL LLANO AND NORTHWESTERN BURNET COUNTIES... At 818 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Stolz, or near Llano, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Two inch hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Kingsland, Llano, Buchanan Dam, Gainesville, Granite Shoals, Horseshoe Bay, Buchanan Lake Village, Highland Haven, Inks Lake State Park, Lone Grove, Bluffton, Stolz, Longhorn Cavern State Park, Oxford, Tow, Sunrise Beach Village and State Highways 29 and 71. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...2.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. If on or near Lake Buchanan, get away from the water and move indoors or inside a vehicle. remember, lightning can strike out to 15 miles from the parent thunderstorm. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Move to safe shelter now! Do not be caught on the water in a thunderstorm.
